answers.answer: I had to do that too its icky because I had severe swelling but the results didn't show a blood pressure problem
But I am having high blood pressure. Do they just monitor you if there's nothing in your pee ??

Usually just monitoring if no protein but it all depends on your dr...my bps high, was just hospitalized and did the urine collecyion...im almost 35 weeks so hopefully he decides to take her early cuz i cant work or function like this
Okay. Im 37+4 so Im not rlly sure what he will decide. Hopefully everything turns out good! I rlly don't want to be induced
137/89 isn't all that high. My blood pressure with my daughter as consistently around 140/90 and my midwife was fine with it.
Ya yours wasnt bad mines been 145/92-95 & 159/90

See my OB said 140/90 is when they start to worry abt your BP combined w/ the swelling in my fingers is why he has me doing the collection..and my BP hasn't been anywhere near these #s until these last 2 appts. I just want my baby to be okay which is why Im worrying

I just turned 37 weeks and my doctor put me on bed rest bc I had swelling in my feet and trace of protein in my urine. My bp is usually around 116/65 or so but now its been 145/83 or 154/92. Laying on my left side all day is boring.

Ya with all of it combined...but youre so close anyways it might be safer with baby out than in incase it does progress...i know you dont wanna be induced but if its best then what you want is out the window and what you need takes the drivers seat...good luck

If it's best I'll do it, Im just scared! A family friend actually had a seizure due to preeclampsia a few months ago, it was rlly scary an they never thought it was a possibility because her BP was only slightly elevated. But I guess I'll find out soon enough and hopefully everything is ok
Well positive thoughts to all of us for healthy babies and safe deliveries!

question: So I have to do this due to my blood pressure being consistently high and today it was 137/89 which my Dr said was a little "to close for comfort" on top of swelling in my fingers. My question is if there IS protein in my urine ia that an automatic induction?? My Dr knows I really do not want to be induced so he said we would talk about things after the results but Im just wondering if anyone has experience with this and can maybe shed some light for me.
title: 24 Hour Urine Collection
